Summary: Object with glowing light swooped down then dissappeared.
divs: Sighting Detailson my way home from Easter my wife and I saw a glowing object swoop down to the north of us. I continue driving after couple seconds it disappeared then after another brief second there was a flash over the horizon. The flash was brief but light up a good portion of the sky. It flew in a northern direction and appeared to be egg or oval shaped. it appeared to be dark in color but had a glowing whitish light.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sapulpa
There were no other sightings in Sapulpa on or around March 31st 2013
